description: Simple entity with alloy and particle compositions.

alloy.description: A human description of the alloying system and temper.

elements.description: Chemical symbol of each chemical element.  By convension the dependent element (e.g. Al) is listed first.

phases.description: Name of each phase, excluding matrix.

X0.description: Nominal composition.  Should sum to one.

Xp.description: Average composition of each phase, excluding matrix.  Each row should sum to one.

volfrac.description: Volume fraction of each phase, excluding matrix.

rpart.description: Average particle radius of each phase, excluding matrix.

atvol.description: Average volume per atom for each phase.
